description.para: Reset method resets all attribute classes

Get all visible scores / the first visible score Lazily updates the visible scores, hence not const.

sectiondef.header: Getters for the object margins (left and right).

description.para: The margins are given in x * MEI UNIT

briefdescription.para: Getter to the drawPage.

detaileddescription.para: Normally, getting the page should be done with Doc::SetDrawingPage. This is only a method for asserting that we currently have the right page.

sectiondef.header: Setter for and getter for mensural only flag

briefdescription.para: Temporarily deactivate and reactivate selection.

detaileddescription.para: Used for example to get the complete MEI data. No check and cast-off performed.

briefdescription.para: Interface for class functor visitation.
A copy of the header tree stored as pugi::xml_document.
A copy of the front tree stored as pugi::xml_document.
A copy of the back tree stored as pugi::xml_document.
The music@decls value.
The current page height.
The current page width.
The current page content height (without margings)
The current page content width (without margins)
The current page bottom margin.
The current page left margin.
The current page right margin.
The current page top margin.
the current beam maximal slope
Record notation type for document.

detaileddescription.para: (This should be improved by storing a vector of all notation types of the document for cases mixing notations)

briefdescription.para: An expansion map that contains
The type of document indicates how to deal with the layout information.

detaileddescription.para: A Transcription document type means that the layout information is included and that no layout algorithm should be applied.

briefdescription.para: The object with the default values.

detaileddescription.para: This could be saved somewhere as preferences (todo).

briefdescription.para: The resources (glyph table).
The list of all visible scores Used in Doc::GetCorrespondingScore to quickly determine the score for an object.
A flag indicating if the document has been cast off or not.
The page currently being drawn.
Height of a beam (10 and 6 by default)
Height of a beam spacing (white) (10 and 6 by default)
Brevis width.
Smufl font size (100 par defaut)
Lyric font size
Fingering font size.
Current music font.
Current lyric font.
Current fingering font.
A flag to indicate whether the currentScoreDef has been set or not.

detaileddescription.para: If yes, ScoreDefSetCurrentDoc will not parse the document (again) unless the force parameter is set.

briefdescription.para: A flag to indicate if the data preparation has been done.

detaileddescription.para: If yes, data preparation will be reset before being done again.

briefdescription.para: A flag to indicate that the timemap has been calculated.

detaileddescription.para: The timemap needs to be prepared before MIDI files or timemap JSON files are generated. Value is 0.0 when no timemap has been generated.

briefdescription.para: A flag to indicate whereas the document contains analytical markup to be converted.

detaileddescription.para: This is currently limited to @fermata and @tie. Other attribute markup (@accid and @artic) is converted during the import in MEIInput.

briefdescription.para: A flag to indicate whereas to document contains only mensural music.

detaileddescription.para: Mensural only music will be converted to cast-off segments by Doc::ConvertToCastOffMensuralDoc

briefdescription.para: Page width (MEI scoredef@page.width) - currently not saved.
Page height (MEI scoredef@page.height) - currently not saved.
Page bottom margin (MEI scoredef@page.botmar) - currently not saved.
Page left margin (MEI scoredef@page.leftmar) - currently not saved.
Page right margin (MEI scoredef@page.rightmar) - currently not saved.
Page top margin (MEI scoredef@page.topmar) - currently not saved.
Facsimile information.
Add a page to the document.
Clear the content of the document.
Clear the selection pages.
Generate a document scoreDef when none is provided.

detaileddescription.para: This only looks at the content first system of the document.

briefdescription.para: Generate a document pgFoot if none is provided.
Generate a document pgHead from the MEI header if none is provided.
Generate measure numbers from measure attributes.
Generate an MEI header.
Check if the document has a page with the specified value.
Get the total page count.
Return true if the MIDI generation is already done.

briefdescription.para: Get the ratio between the lyric font size and the music font size.

detaileddescription.para: This is used when the music font is used within text.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Object *object, int staffIndex, data_STAFFREL staffPosition) const
memberdef.name: GetStaffDistance

briefdescription.para: Get the default distance from the staff for the object The distance is given in x * MEI UNIT.
Prepare the timemap for MIDI and timemap file export.

detaileddescription.para: Run trough all the layers and fill the score-time and performance timing variables.

briefdescription.para: Check to see if the timemap has already been calculated.

detaileddescription.para: This needs to return true before ExportMIDI() or ExportTimemap() can export anything (These two functions will automatically run CalculateTimemap() if HasTimemap() return false.

briefdescription.para: Export the document to a MIDI file.

detaileddescription.para: Run trough all the layers and fill the midi file content.

briefdescription.para: Extract a timemap from the document to a JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: Run trough all the layers and fill the timemap file content.

briefdescription.para: Extract expansionMap from the document to JSON string.
Extract music features to JSON string.
Set the initial scoreDef of each page.

detaileddescription.para: This is necessary for integrating changes that occur within a page. It uses the MusObject::SetPageScoreDef functor method for parsing the file. This will be done only if m_currentScoreDefDone is false or force is true.

briefdescription.para: Optimize the scoreDef once the document is cast-off.
Set the GrpSym start / end for each System once ScoreDef is set and (if necessary) optimized.
Prepare the document data.

detaileddescription.para: This sets pointers and value and needs to be done after loading and any editing. For example, it sets the approriate values for the lyrics connectors

briefdescription.para: Casts off the entire document.

detaileddescription.para: Starting from a single system, create and fill pages and systems.

briefdescription.para: Casts off the entire document, only using the document's system breaks if they would be close to the end in the normal document.
Casts off the entire document, using the document's line breaks, but adding its own page breaks.
Casts off the entire document, with options for obeying breaks.

parameterdescription.para: - true to use the sb from the document.
- true to use the pb from the document.
- true to sometimes use encoded sb and pb.

briefdescription.para: Undo the cast off of the entire document.

detaileddescription.para: The document will then contain one single page with one single system.

briefdescription.para: Cast off of the entire document according to the encoded data (pb and sb).

detaileddescription.para: Does not perform any check on the presence and / or validity of such data.

briefdescription.para: Convert the doc from score-based to page-based MEI.

detaileddescription.para: Containers will be converted to systemMilestone / systemMilestoneEnd. Does not perform any check if the data needs or can be converted.

briefdescription.para: Convert mensural MEI into cast-off (measure) segments looking at the barLine objects.

detaileddescription.para: Segment positions occur where a barLine is set on all staves. castOff parameters indicates if we perform cast off (true) or un-cast off

briefdescription.para: Convert analytical encoding (@fermata, @tie) to correpsonding elements By default, the element are used only for the rendering and not preserved in the MEI output Permanent conversion discard analytical markup and elements will be preserved in the MEI output.
Transpose the content of the doc.
Convert encoded <expansion> before rendering.
Set drawing values (page size, etc) when drawing a page.

detaileddescription.para: By default, the page size of the document is taken. If a page is given, the size of the page is taken.

briefdescription.para: Reset drawing page to NULL.

detaileddescription.para: This might be necessary if we have replaced a page in the document. We need to call this because otherwise looking at the page idx will fail. See Doc::LayOut for an example.

briefdescription.para: Return the width adjusted to the content of the current drawing page.

detaileddescription.para: This includes the appropriate left and right margins.

briefdescription.para: Return the height adjusted to the content of the current drawing page.

detaileddescription.para: This includes the appropriate top and bottom margin (using top as bottom).

briefdescription.para: Setter for markup flag.

detaileddescription.para: See corresponding enum in vrvdef.h Set when reading the file to indicate what markup conversion needs to be applied. See Doc::ConvertMarkupDoc

briefdescription.para: Return true if the document has been cast off already.
Calculates the music font size according to the m_interlDefin reference value.
Generate the measure indices.
Determine all visible scores.
This class is a hold the data and corresponds to the model of a MVC design pattern.
